Positions.Description:
• Digital Project Manager at Atomized Studios supporting the production of virtual events and summits for GOALS HOUSE and the UK Government.
• Digital Project Manager at The Two Marias. Planning, production and delivery of HTML5
banners campaigns and emails for VCCP Health.
• Project Manager for gohenry's Creative Studios. Setting up processes and tools. Planning,
trafficking, production and delivery of TV ads, websites and banner campaigns.

Positions.JobLevel: Senior Manager (more than 5 years management experience)
Positions.Description:
• Scrum Project Manager for HomeAway's Creative Department. Planning, production and delivery of emails and banner campaigns for all their international brands.
• Planning, QA management and delivery of Apple's first ever social media campaign on Tumblr.
• Planning, production and delivery of HTML5 and Flash banner campaigns for EMEA, APAC and
LATAM markets for clients such as Apple, Electronic Arts (Star Wars and FIFA17), Honda and Expedia at various agencies (Bossa, Hogarth & Ogilvy, OLIVER, Freedman International)
• Planning & management of the Front End Development Team of MATCHESFASHION.

Planning, production and delivery of banner, Facebook and email campaigns and website
maintenance for clients such as Pizza Hut, Danone, Nestlé, Lloyds Bank and Capita at various
agencies (DraftFCB, Radley Yeldar, Suburb)

Team leadership, creative strategy, copywriting and Flash development for online campaigns
and microsites for SEAT, Nike and Nokia at Elephant7, Wieden+Kennedy and Double You.

Project Manager and PMM for the Gaming team at Publisher Solutions. Bringing operational
excellence by providing new processes and tools, planning and leading product programs and launches, GTM strategies and Alpha and Beta testing within top gaming publishers.
• Active member and volunteer of the Latin@FB London Community.

Project Manager at Publisher Solutions working on the Google Bidding Integration project.
Identifying main workstreams and their POCs. Planning, coordinating and tracking deliverables
between departments until completion. Full onboarding of new team members, creation of internal and external documentation and planning & management of off-sites with Google.
• Technical Program Manager at the PS Platform team responsible for the SDK releases' planning
and tracking, documentation and management and prioritisation of the team tasks.

Part of the global P&G team and Lead Project Manager for Always and Aussie and responsible
for the entire digital output: banner campaigns, Facebook, Mobile Apps and digital toolkits.
• Lead Project Manager for Tassimo's website redesign and build for 4 international markets.

Lead Project Manager for McDonald's and    ~~~~~~~~~  , being responsible for the entire
digital output: banner campaigns, Facebook Apps and YouTube channels.

Game testing, bug reporting, Spanish translation and proofreading for cross-platform (PC, XBOX 360, PS2, PS3, PSP, Wii, DS) video games such as SEGA Rally, Sonic Riders, SEGA
Superstars Tennis and Final Fantasy VII.

Team leadership, creative strategy, copywriting and Flash development for online campaigns
and microsites for Audi, Volkswagen, Abanderado, Princesa, Ocean and Unno.

Findings.Message: You should not use the PDF format for your resume. Due to inherent limitations with text extraction from PDFs, you are less likely to get a job when using a PDF resume.
Every position in a resume should have a job title.
Every degree in a resume should have a name or type associated with it, such as 'B.S.' or 'M.S.'.
High school (or lower) education should not be included on resumes that contain higher-level education.

The following section was identified as a skills section type: 'Key Skills'. Skills should not be in a separate section, but instead, each skill should be included in the descriptions of work history or education. THIS IS INCREDIBLY IMPORTANT FOR AI MATCHING ALGORITHMS

ResumeMetadata.PlainText:
~~~~~~~~~  
   ~~~~~~~  , N4 1DH London
   ~~~~~~~~~~~~  
   ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~  

Accomplished and versatile Project Manager who has worked on both client-side (Facebook,
HomeAway and Apple) and advertising agencies (Ogilvy, Leo Burnett and Razorfish) dealing with
complex projects for global markets involving cross-functional teams. All along those years, I have
successfully managed the creation of numerous products (websites, apps, HTML5 banners, CRM,
social, games and OOH) from initial scoping to delivery. Previous experience also includes 10 years
working in a range of digital roles (Copywriter, Creative Director, Web Developer and Video Game
Tester).

Key Skills


•   Project planning, scoping and budgeting	•   Problem solving and critical thinking
•   Project documentation	•   QA, UAT, Alpha and Beta testing
•   Financial tracking and management	•   Scrum, Kanban, Waterfall and PRINCE2
•   Risk and issue management	•   JIRA, Slack, Trello, MS Project, Basecamp
•   Team management and leadership	•   Google Docs, Workplace and Adobe CC
•   Line management and mentoring	•   English (Fluent), Spanish (Native), Catalan
•   Advanced client and stakeholder skills	(Native) and Portuguese (Fluent)
•   Excellent verbal and written communication	•   Passionate about creativity and technology
